## Package interface

Contains information about the product available for the user to purchase. For more info see https://docs.revenuecat.com/docs/entitlements

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare interface Package 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [identifier](./purchases-js.package.identifier.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string | Unique identifier for this package. Can be one a predefined package type or a custom one. |
|  [packageType](./purchases-js.package.packagetype.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [PackageType](./purchases-js.packagetype.md) | The type of package. |
|  [rcBillingProduct](./purchases-js.package.rcbillingproduct.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [Product](./purchases-js.product.md) | The [Product](./purchases-js.product.md) assigned to this package. |
